title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models, packaged as a single Docker container.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) providing async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library (pkg.go.dev: github.com/ollama-go/ollama) for embedding Ollama in Go apps.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Pre-built CUDA-enabled Docker images for Ollama with automatic GPU runtime detection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers queries using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt-based bot for bringing local LLM power into Slack channels via Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app (PyPI: django-ollama) adding Ollama-powered chat endpoints to Django projects.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template for quick web demos backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service wrapper exposing extra endpoints (batch, embeddings, health) over Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation repo using Ollama + Chroma for private docs Q&A.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# .NET client (NuGet: OllamaSharp) for integrating Ollama into .NET applications.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Community-curated list of ready-to-use Modelfiles for niche/domains (code, medical, role-play, etc.).
